import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { } = prod useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return ( <> Back

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
